Package geometries

package geometries
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Cylinder
    Class Cylinder is the class representing a cylinder in a Cartesian 3-Dimensional coordinate system.
    Geometry
    Abstract class Geometry is the basic class representing a geometry in Cartesian 3-Dimensional coordinate system.
    Plane
    Class Plane is the basic class representing a plane in a Cartesian 3-Dimensional coordinate system.
    Polygon
    Polygon class represents two-dimensional polygon in 3D Cartesian coordinate system
    RadialGeometry
    Abstract class RadialGeometry is the basic class representing a radial geometry in Cartesian 3-Dimensional coordinate system.
    Sphere
    Class Sphere is the class representing a sphere in a Cartesian 3-Dimensional coordinate system.
    Triangle
    Class Triangle is the class representing a 2-Dimensional triangle in a Cartesian 3-Dimensional coordinate system.
    Tube
    Class Tube is the class representing a Tube(infinity cylinder) in Cartesian 3-Dimensional coordinate system.
